email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. We were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed with the owner, and they’re willing to adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.00 is acceptable, but can we push the laycan to October 16-21? Also, can you confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, yes, the cargo size is confirmed at 140,000 metric tons. The owner has agreed to adjust the laycan to October 16-21. Let me know if we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $51.00 per metric ton, laycan October 16-21, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Please send over the recap. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, please find the fixture recap below for your review:

- Vessel: MV Ocean Star
- Cargo: 140,000 MT Crude Oil
- Load Port: Houston
- Discharge Port: Rotterdam
- Laycan: October 16-21
- Freight Rate: $51.00 per MT
- Demurrage: $25,000 per day, pro rata

Let me know if everything is in order. Best, Sarah
